title: jbang app install quarkus,but  catalog 'quarkusio' not found

labels.name: area/jbang
labels.description: Issues related to when using jbang.dev with Quarkus

body:
### Describe the bug

jbang app install --fresh --force --verbose quarkus@quarkusio
[jbang] jbang version 0.80.2
[jbang] Duplicating classpath resource jbang-catalog.json
